publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1194.1 Tommy Sheridan: Summary Warrants—As an amendment to motion (S1M-1194) in the name of Phil Gallie, insert at end "hopes that the Conservative group of MSPs will now reverse their opposition to the abolition of poindings and warrant sales and believes poindings and warrant sales should be scrapped by 1 April 2001."

S1M-1194.1 Tommy Sheridan: Summary Warrants—As an amendment to motion (S1M-1194) in the name of Phil Gallie, insert at end "hopes that the Conservative group of MSPs will now reverse their opposition to the abolition of poindings and warrant sales and believes that poindings and warrant sales should be scrapped by 1 April 2001."
S1M-1194.1 Summary Warrants (lodged on 20 September 2000) Alex Neil*

S1M-1194.1 Tommy Sheridan: Summary Warrants—As an amendment to motion (S1M-1194) in the name of Phil Gallie, insert at end "hopes that the Conservative group of MSPs will now reverse their opposition to the abolition of poindings and warrant sales and believes that poindings and warrant sales should be scrapped by 1 April 2001." Supported by: Alex Neil, Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-1194.1 Summary Warrants (lodged on 20 September 2000) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-1194.1 Summary Warrants (lodged on 20 September 2000) Michael Russell*, Brian Adam*, Christine Grahame*

Supported by: Alex Neil, Mr Adam Ingram, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Michael Russell, Brian Adam, Christine Grahame
